**** PLEASE DO NOT EDIT ****

Users

`U` (
    I       BIGINT UNSIGNED UNIQUE                                          COMMENT 'User Identifier',
    N       VARCHAR(255)            DEFAULT NULL                            COMMENT 'User Name',
    P       VARCHAR(255)            DEFAULT NULL                            COMMENT 'User Pass',
    EMA     VARCHAR(254)            DEFAULT NULL                            COMMENT 'User EMail Address',
    AC      BIGINT UNSIGNED         DEFAULT 4294967295                      COMMENT 'User Access Clearance',
    CDT     DATETIME                DEFAULT NOW()                           COMMENT 'User Creation Date and Time',
    PRIMARY KEY(I),
    KEY ACK (AC)
) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci

ENGINE = InnoDB
